questions.question_text: "viability" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The ability to work successfully or be effective
A sudden change in market demand
questions.example_sentence: The report analyzes the viability of entering three emerging markets.
questions.explanation:
実行可能性・成功の見込み
需要変動
割引制度
法的承認

questions.question_text: "insight" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A deep understanding of a situation or issue
A financial penalty for late payment
questions.example_sentence: The survey data provides valuable insights into consumer behavior.
questions.explanation:
洞察・深い理解
罰金
セキュリティ
配送方法

questions.question_text: "allocate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To distribute resources or tasks for a specific purpose
To delay the launch of a project
questions.example_sentence: The company decided to allocate additional budget to market research.
questions.explanation:
割り当てる
延期する
交渉する
取り消す

questions.question_text: "emerging" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: The report identifies key opportunities in emerging economies.
questions.explanation:
新興の・発展途上
衰退
法規制が厳しい
国内限定

questions.question_text: "benchmark" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A standard used for comparison or evaluation
questions.example_sentence: Sales figures from the previous year serve as a benchmark for evaluating progress.
questions.explanation:
基準・指標
許可証
スローガン
条件
